name: Take Me Away
lyric:
I used to be myself

And used to play around

Sometimes I don't want to think

Maybe cause I'm afraid



I do wanna sing my song

No matter what you say

With you I never think

Along I look into my soul



One day I hope some people talk to me

About life

But I can't take no more

Where ... where my Shangri-la



I do wanna sing my song

No matter what you say

With you I never think

Along I look into my soul



One day I hope some people talk to me

About life

But I can't take no more

Where... where my Shangri-la



Many many time I want to go

So I hardly open my eyes

The truth even force me run... run away... but no way

But now I'm same to you

But I feel nothing better for sure

The star, star, star, would you take me away



Many many time I want to go

So I hardly open my eyes

The truth even force me run... run away... but no way

But now I'm same to you

But I feel nothing better for sure

The star, star, star, would you take me away



The best for right now





感谢杜杰(Giles Tully)、亚伦(Patrick Weyer-Brown)和拾肆(14)在英文歌词上给予的帮助。

制作人：Giles Tully / 李赤

缩混：Giles Tully / Patrick Weyer-Brown / 姜北生

Engineered by Hyperbolic Productions (Patrick Weyer-Brown & Giles Tully)

Acoustic Guitar & Drum recorded by Hyperbolic Productions (Patrick Weyer-Brown) at YUM music

Guitar Bass Vocal recorded by Hyperbolic Productions (Patrick Weyer-Brown & Giles Tully)

其他录音：时俊峰 福达录音棚 / 姜北生 环球唱片录音棚 / 方岩 Funky Studio

人声和声：逃跑计划

母带处理：Patrick Weyer-Brown (FR) 法国SAE Paris 录音棚

看到夜空中最闪亮的星的评论量 吃了一惊又由衷高兴； 但这一首一进来评论量？？？ 这个和08年我们结婚才是承载了当年最初的记忆的；这大白话英语歌词唱得hhhhhh；还记得他们乐队英文名叫perdel，大意是perfect delete，他们说虽然叫逃跑计划实际无处可逃，只能完美删除。说起来好像在09年迷笛音乐节还和毛川擦身而过被我一把抓住拍了个合照；只是不善整理照片的我.....大概湮灭在废弃的大学笔记本电脑了吧

来自iPhone客户端
怪不得有人不待见这个乐队，随机听了这首歌，副歌部分唯一好听的那一小段旋律不就是20年前周华健的《应该》吗，物权法里多少连续个音符一致算抄袭了我记不清了 反正中国这种抄袭见太多了

来自iPhone客户端
0331 最近，逃跑计划为电影《睡在我上铺的兄弟》翻唱了老狼的经典歌曲，中规中矩的改编把真挚的思念变成了戏谑的隔靴搔痒，不由让人担心他们的状态。听听他们首专《世界》吧，明亮的色彩与气质一致性，几乎每首都能单曲循环。这会是又一支迅速滑落的乐队吗？想想果味VC吧。
這首你們自己的歌，送給你們自己。

多么好听的英文发音啊
